name: Metal Marbles
description:
Instructions: Decide who will be P1 (blue marble) and P2 (yellow marble). Take turns using your shooter marble to try and knock some of the smaller marbles out of the circle. 

Optional: if the player knocks out at least one marble out of the circle AND their shooter marble stays inside the circle, they can shoot again.

Controls: Use your left mouse button to make a drag-like motion from your shooter marble towards the desired direction. The speed of the motion will determine the strength of your shot.

Press F5 to play again (I might have forgotten to implement this feature before building the project >w<). 

Points:

  • Copper marble = 1 point
  • Silver marble = 2 point
  • Gold marble = 3 point

3rd party assets:

  • Yughues Free Metal Materials
  • Teko font by Indian Type Foundry
